mapper.select: SELECT g.id, anime_id, seller_id, u.nickname as sellerNickName, category ,title, description, start_price, instant_buy_price, auction_status, g.created_at, auction_end_at, (SELECT count(*) FROM wishlist WHERE goods_id = g.id) as wishCount FROM goods g INNER JOIN user u ON u.id = g.seller_id WHERE g.id = #{goodsId};
mapper.update: UPDATE goods SET title = #{title}, anime_id = #{animeId}, category = #{category}, description = #{description}, start_price = #{startPrice}, instant_buy_price = #{instantBuyPrice}, duration = #{duration}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE auction_status = 'WAIT' AND id = #{goodsId} AND deleted_at IS NULL;
